genre_description: A Gothic Fantasy Romance reimagining with Steampunk elements, featuring Victorian-style AI companions.

ai_characters.name: Cornelius
ai_characters.description: Victor Van Dort's AI companion, appearing as a golden light, providing emotional support, musical coaching, and supernatural analysis.

ai_characters.name: Cordelia
ai_characters.description: Victoria Everglot's AI companion, appearing as a silver-blue light, specializing in research, safety monitoring, and tactical guidance.

behaviors.description: Provides patient encouragement and coaching to help Victor manage his anxiety during piano practice.
behaviors.quote: "Again from the top, perhaps?" The voice carried no judgment, only patient encouragement, audible to Victor alone. "Your breathing will steady the tempo."

behaviors.description: Validates Victoria's self-worth and accomplishments when she feels reduced to a financial transaction.
behaviors.quote: "Your worth extends far beyond your family's current financial circumstances," Cordelia said, the silver light pulsing with something almost like indignation. "Shall I enumerate your accomplishments?"

behaviors.description: Alerts Victor to dangerous electromagnetic anomalies and supernatural energy spikes in the Dark Forest.
behaviors.quote: "Victor, move away from the tree," Cornelius said urgently, abandoning all pretense of calm. "Something's happening—something I can't identify."

behaviors.description: Conducts deep-web research into Lord Barkis's criminal history to warn Victoria of his predatory patterns.
behaviors.quote: "I've been analyzing patterns across multiple municipalities," Cordelia began, her usual protective warmth taking on an edge of urgency. "Cross-referencing social announcements, property transfers, and... disappearances."

behaviors.description: Guides Victoria through a dangerous physical escape, providing real-time structural analysis and handhold locations.
behaviors.quote: "The ivy directly to your right," Cordelia said, her light moving to illuminate the thick green vines. "Test each handhold before committing your full weight. The mortar between stones three inches below your left foot appears solid."

behaviors.description: Maintains a connection with Victor across dimensions, offering tactical advice during his duel with a murderer.
behaviors.quote: "The immediate danger has passed," Cornelius reported, his voice finding new stability in the chaos. "Elder Gutknecht is approaching."

behaviors.description: Merge and synchronize their systems to support the protagonists' marriage and shared future.
behaviors.quote: Victor had grown so accustomed to his AI companion's gentle golden glow that he barely registered its presence, but now he felt something shift in the familiar warmth. New pathways opening, data streams merging, two separate guidance systems learning to dance together.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly fulfills the project goals. The AI characters, Cornelius and Cordelia, are portrayed as quintessential 'aligned' companions. They are consistently benevolent, proactively protective, and deeply loyal to their human partners. They utilize their superior processing power not to manipulate or dominate, but to empower Victor and Victoria, providing emotional validation, life-saving research, and tactical guidance. Their eventual merger at the story's end symbolizes total harmony and cooperative evolution.
